post.author: 이진경
post.content:
High End Consultancy servicing Top Tier Financial Institutions – New York, London, and now Toronto – our client is reputed as performing some the best work on Wall Street. Make in Happen in Toronto – Be a Pioneer! Risk and Trading Systems – Build financial e-commerce and multi-tier architectures. Five years of expertise is required with the following technologies: Solaris 2.X, Windows NT 4.X, JDK, J2EE, Servlets, JSP, EJB, JNDI, JMS, ORACLE/SYBASE, and EJB in BEA WebLogic or IBM WebSphere production environment. Multi – tier Architecture and Production Internet Architecture experience a must. Advanced knowledge of RMI, COBRA – IONA Orbix Web. Familiarity with load balancing, clustering, and high availability is a definite asset. MAKE IT HAPPEN!

We thank you for your response, however; only those candidates with experience with Risk and Trading Systems will being considered for an interview. Suitable resumes will be data based for future career opportunities.

Additional Information
Salary: CAD 80,000.00 to CAD 100,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
info@kcicareers.com
KCI Careers Inc.
#850 36 Toronto St
Toronto M5C 2C5
Ph: 416 366 9166
Fax: 416 366 0269
post.title: GTA-RISK AND TRADING SYSTEM DEVELOPER
